column1: Bryn Forbes posts half a "Tony Snell" in the Bucks win tonight.

[Perez] Amazing stat just mentioned on Fox Sports Florida: Tony Snell is now the NBA’s new record holder for most minutes played without attempting a single free throw (386).

Lost in the Curry hype tonight, Mike Scott put up a similarly historical performance, a Tony Snell: 0/0/0/0/0 in 14 minutes.
Throwback to when Tony Snell went 0/0/0/0/0. I feel like no one talks about Andre Robersons infamous 0/0/0/0/0 game.
Tony Snell, with 16 games left in the season, is on pace to record the second ever 50/50/90 season, and maybe even 50/50/100.

(Plus/Minus Review) Nemanja Bjelica led all players last night in "plus/minus" - notching a +33 in only 18 minutes for the Warriors in a win against NOP. The following players all led their respective teams – DRose, KCP, Blake Griffin, Thad Young, PG13, Lamar Stevens, and Tony Snell.
